title: Looking for particular font
content:
Hi all,   
   
my first post here, although i haven been lurking for a while. I'm so glad that i found this board.   
   
Here is the question, im remember i once saw a font that had/has vertical ear on the "g" glyph.   
Can't say for sure but i think i might also saw it here.. anyway, any help would be much appreciated.   
   
Thx.
author: emu2

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/goudy-old-style/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/goudy-old-style/)   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bernhard-modern/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bernhard-modern/)   
Not quite vertical, but stressed that way   
T
